definition: a swimming kick used while treading water, beat thoroughly and conclusively in a competition or fight
details:
noun
- a swimming kick used while treading water
verb
- beat thoroughly and conclusively in a competition or fight
= synonyms: lick
- give a thrashing to
= synonyms: lam
- beat the seeds out of a grain
= synonyms: thresh
- move data into and out of core rather than performing useful computation
= example: move data into and out of core rather than performing useful computation
- beat so fast that (the heart's) output starts dropping until (it) does not manage to pump out blood at all
- move or stir about violently
= example: move or stir about violently
= synonyms: toss
- dance the slam dance
= synonyms: slam dance
